resources.string:
Acceleration "
" The rate of change in velocity with respect to time. "
" Displacement "
" Distance from the objects original position. "
" Distance "
" Change in position from the last location. "
" Final Velocity "
" The last velocity of a given object after a period of time. "
" Initial Velocity "
" The velocity at beginning of your experiment. "
" Newtons First Law "
" An object at rest stays at rest and an object in motion stays in motion "
" Newtons Second Law "
" The acceleration of an object is dependent upon two variables - the net force acting upon the object and the mass of the object. "
" Newtons Third Law "
" For every action, there is an equal and opposite reaction. "
" Kinematic Formulas "
" vf = vi + a*t "
" DeltaX = ((vf + vi)/2) * t "
" DeltaX = vi*t + (1/2)a*t^2 "
" vf^2 = vi^2 + 2*a*DeltaX "
"
"
